description.p: These clothes have the ability to change into any style, color and type of clothing in appearence.
As an action you can change the appearence of your clothing.
The change is an illusion and as such does not grant you any bonuses to armor or any other benifits of a magical nature even if used to replicate the style of a magic attire.
These clothes have the ability to change into any style, color and type of clothing in appearence.
As an action can change the appearence of your clothing.
The change is a physical one and can grant you the AC bonus if the new form is that of Armor provided you have that armor proficiency.
The clothing gains the weight of whatever form it is in.
